#summary How to help ZScreen by becoming a Project Member
#labels Featured,Phase-QA

= Introduction =

You have decided to contribute code to ZScreen? Great! Here are the steps that will get you easily started. 

= Requirements = 
 # Visual Studio 2008 or above
 # AnkhSVN 2.0 or above for SVN access
 # Google Code Password

= Getting Started =

 # Send an email to zscreen@googlegroups.com just to say that you would like to join. This is only needed so we can add you as a Project Member. 
 # Download AnkhSVN from http://ankhsvn.open.collab.net/servlets/ProjectProcess?pageID=3794
 # Retrieve your Google Code password from http://code.google.com/hosting/settings
 
== Visual Studio 2008 == 
Once you have installed AnkhSVN, you will see a new menu item in File > Open menu:

[http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/7508/ss20090402112721.png]

Click this and press the *Add Repository URL*

[http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/3674/ss20090402112829.png]

Paste 
{{{
https://zscreen.googlecode.com/svn/trunk
}}}

in the text box and press OK:

[http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/7731/browserepository2009040.png]

Double click on ZScreen.sln: 

[http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/8818/openfromsubversion20090.png]

Press OK for the screen after that: 

[http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/46/openprojectfromsubversi.png]

== AnkhSVN ==

AnkhSVN will download the project to the path you have specified. 

Once you have modified your code in ZScreen, 

 # Type a message describing the change 
 # Press the Commit button to upload the code

[http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/3122/ss20090402113351.png]

If this is the first time, AnkhSVN will ask for the user name and password. Simply input your Gmail address and the Google Code password. 

You are done! :)
